column5: That give the schake for the summer. A nice video:https://youtu.be/UaeTLWlesgM
Thank you. That was very well done. It also led to another video on LOTW which was awesome. LOTW is truly a jewel.
Nice video Makes me want to get out fishing this weekend Well maybe look thru some rod building catalogs

It's gonna be a long winter............... Crap, a couple nights ago I woke up from a dream that I was on the water fishing in Canada. That usually doesn't happen until closer to spring. Then the recurring dream is I get to the lake and forgot reels or rods or something else essential plus the trip is nearly over and I haven't gotten on the water yet. Used to be I was in public naked. Now I'm missing out on my fishing trip for one reason or another. As sure as the sun rises, I must be getting old!Good video. Drones are a novelty now, but are useful for a different perspective that is fascinating.Pooch
